name: Yakima Community Vaccine Center
info: ***PFIZER VACCINATIONS*** !!!!VACUNAS DE PFIZER!!! Enter fairgrounds through Gate 12 off of Pacific Avenue. Be prepared to show confirmation of your appointment or you may experience a slightly longer wait. Masks are required. Please wear clothing which allows access to your shoulder. Vaccinations at this site are reserved for people who live and/or work in Washington State. Minors age 16 and 17 must be accompanied by a parent. Ingresar por la puerta 12 en la avenida Pacífico. Se requieren máscaras. Por favor, use ropa que permita acceso a su brazo. Las vacunas en este sitio están reservadas para las personas que viven o trabajan en el estado de Washington. Los menores de 16 y 17 años deben estar acompañados por uno de sus padres. *** PFIZER VACCINATIONS*** !!!!VACUNAS DE PFIZER!!!
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Yakima County Health District COVID Vaccination Site
info:
***1ST AND 2ND DOSE ONLY MODERNA VACCINATIONS*** !!!!VACUNAS DE SEGUNDA DOSIS ÚNICAMENTE MODERNA!!! Enter fairgrounds through Gate 12 off of Pacific Avenue. Be prepared to show confirmation of your appointment or you may experience a slightly longer wait. Masks are required. Please wear clothing which allows access to your shoulder. Vaccinations at this site are reserved for people who live and/or work in Washington State. Ingresar por la puerta 12 en la avenida Pacífico. Se requieren máscaras. Por favor, use ropa que permita acceso a su brazo. Las vacunas en este sitio están reservadas para las personas que viven o trabajan en el estado de Washington. ***THOSE WHO GET THEIR 1ST MODERNA SHOT WILL NEED TO FIND OTHER ARRANGEMENTS TO RECEIVE THEIR SECOND DOSE BY FINDING A CLINIC AT THE WEBSITE PROVIDED. 
AQUELLOS QUE RECIBAN SU PRIMERA DISPARO MODERNA DEBERÁN ENCONTRAR OTROS ARREGLOS PARA RECIBIR SU 2ª DOSIS ENCONTRANDO UNA CLÍNICA EN EL SITIO WEB PROPORCIONADO.**** https://prepmod.doh.wa.gov/
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Lewis County Mall
vaccines: Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine, Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine
info:
****This is a single dose Johnson & Johnson and 1ST DOSE PFIZER vaccine clinic.**** and is by appointment and walk-in. Please note: J&J vaccine can only be administered to individuals 18 years of age or older according CDC requirements while Pfizer can be administered to those 16 and 17 years of age with signed parental consent.

This clinic is located at the west end of the Lewis County Mall in the former Sears location. Please park in front or to the west end of the building. This is a walk in location. Please let us know if you or someone you are with needs assistance of any kind.  **You should also plan your visit around waiting for 15 minutes in the observation area so we can monitor for any unlikely adverse reactions to the vaccine.** Certain people with pre-identified conditions or past anaphylaxis events may be asked to wait for 30 minutes of observation.

Free language translation services are provided. Video ASL translation is also provided.

Please bring your appointment confirmation. Please do not come if you are feeling ill. Please arrive as close as possible to your scheduled time to prevent crowding that will impede appropriate social distancing. - It is best to wear clothes that will allow for access to your upper arm, just below the shoulder. Given the limited supply of COVID-19 vaccine available at this time and Washington's commitment to equitable and fair access, those seeking COVID-19 vaccines at this clinic location must either live or work in Washington state. If you do not live or work in Washington, please do not make an appointment or travel to this site.  **Masks are required. If you do not have a mask, one will be provided.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Arlington Airport Covid-19 Vaccine Site
info:
Everyone 16 and older in Washington is eligible for COVID-19 vaccination.

Please also note that, even if you are otherwise eligible, you must be 18 or older for the Moderna or Johnson & Johnson vaccine, and 16 or older for the Pfizer vaccine (parent/guardian must be present to sign the consent form).

Appointments are highly recommended but not required.  Please arrive no more than 10 minutes prior to your appointment time. Expect to stay between 15-30 minutes after you receive your vaccine to monitor for any adverse reaction. Medical staff will be on hand. A mask must be worn at all times during the appointment, and please wear clothing with short or loose sleeves.

****IF YOU ARE SCHEDULING YOUR 2ND DOSE APPOINTMENT, YOU MUST PROVIDE PROOF OF 1ST DOSE (example: vaccination card, medical record, myir.net immunization record)****
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Camano Island Fire and Rescue- COVID Vaccination Site
info: Pfizer clinic aiming to reach 16-18 year old age group. Parent or guardian must be present with minor and consent must be filled out.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Benton Franklin - Kennewick COVID Vaccine Clinic
info: ******Pfizer Clinic***** All patients 16 years old and older can register. If you are 16-17 years old you must be with a parent or guardian or verbal parental/guardian consent. **FOR 2ND DOSE PLEASE BRING YOUR COVID-19 VACCINATION RECORD CARD** For Both 1st and 2nd dose - Please bring your appointment confirmation. Please do not come if you are feeling ill. Given the limited supply of COVID-19 vaccine available at this time and Washington's commitment to equitable and fair access, those seeking COVID-19 vaccines at this clinic location you must either live or work in Washington state. If you do not live or work in Washington, please do not make an appointment or travel to this site. You may be asked to provide something that shows you live or work in Washington, such as a utility bill; a voucher from your employer; or your work, school, or state ID. The site will not make a copy or record this information in any way. This is only to show that you currently live or work in Washington. ---- **Masks are required. If you do not have a mask, one will be provided. Follow posted signage about traffic and parking at the site. **Enter the fairgrounds from 10th Street.** If you have lost your vaccination record card, please go to https://wa.myir.net
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
